name: EDI
description:
This is an action platform game. you collect strawberry, kill the boss then finish the game! Game Input:  GamePad: 

move : leftjoystick 

 jump: A

dash: B

attack: X, Y

grab wall: RB

shoot: RT

KeyBoard: 

move : w/a/s/d 

jump: space      

dash:     ;      

attack: L, O      

grab wall: shift     

shoot: P

Game Resource From:

Art work:

Sci-fi Hero Sprite by Penusbmic (itch.io)

Kenney • Home

8 Guns + Projectiles by KingKelpo (itch.io)

Sounds:

https://opengameart.org/content/12-player-movement-sfx

Thanks for all the contributes! Enjoy Yourself~
